ai-patthana23.32:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles means to the extent of the Dhamma.
ai-patthana23.32:1.1_0: not given up by love, nor by middle results.
ai-patthana23.32:2.1_0: Not having given up inferiority, wholesome quality is a condition for unskillful qualities.
ai-patthana23.32:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana23.32:3.1_0: Not inquired, you shouldn’t give rise to middling things that cause negligence.
